info.title: Adobe Analytics APIs
info.description:
The endpoints described here are routed through Adobe.io. 
								In order to use these endpoints you must create an oAuth client that is 
								subscribed to access the Adobe Analytics Reporting API.

companyname.description: The target company name, without spaces

get.summary: Retrieve many calculated metrics
get.description:
A calculated metric response will always include these default items: *id, name, description, rsid, owner, polarity, precision, type* 

Other attributes can be optionally requested through the 'expansion' field:

* *modified*: Date that the metric was last modified (ISO 8601)
* *definition*: Calculated metric definition as JSON object
* *compatibility*: Products that the metric is compatible with
* *reportSuiteName*: Also return the friendly Report Suite name for the RSID
* *tags*: Gives all existing tags associated with the calculated metric

For more information about calculated metrics go [here](https://github.com/AdobeDocs/analytics-2.0-apis/blob/master/calculatedmetrics.md)

parameters.name: rsids
parameters.description: Filter list to only include calculated metrics tied to specified RSID list (comma-delimited)

parameters.name: ownerId
parameters.description: Filter list to only include calculated metrics owned by the specified loginId

parameters.name: filterByIds
parameters.description: Filter list to only include calculated metrics in the specified list (comma-delimited list of IDs) (this is the same as calculatedMetricFilter, and is overwritten by calculatedMetricFilter

parameters.name: toBeUsedInRsid
parameters.description: The report suite where the calculated metric intended to be used.  This report suite will be used to determine things like compatibility and permissions.  If it is not specified then the permissions will be calculated based on the union of all metrics authorized in all groups the user belongs to.  If the compatibility expansion is specified and toBeUsedInRsid is not then the compatibility returned is based off the compatibility from the last time the calculated metric was saved.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter list to only include calculated metrics that contains the Name

parameters.name: tagNames
parameters.description: Filter list to only include calculated metrics that contains one of the tags

parameters.name: favorite
parameters.description: Filter list to only include calculated metrics that are favorites

parameters.name: approved
parameters.description: Filter list to only include calculated metrics that are approved

parameters.name: sortProperty
parameters.description: Property to sort by (name, modified_date, id is currently allowed)

parameters.name: expansion
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of additional calculated metric metadata fields to include on response.

parameters.name: includeType
parameters.description: Include additional calculated metrics not owned by user. The "all" option takes precedence over "shared"

400.description: Unable to retrieve list of calculated metrics shared with user

401.description: Owner filter error; user specified is not in the same company as the requesting user

403.description: Requesting non-shared calculated metrics for other users is restricted to admin users

500.description: External API error; Calculated metric retrieval failed

parameters.name: expansion
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of additional calculated metric metadata fields to include on response.

requestBody.description: JSON-formatted Object containing key/value pairs for calculated metric creation.

400.description: Invalid input; name, rsid, and definition are all required. Definition must be formatted as a JSON Object.

500.description: External API error; Calculated metric create or retrieval failed

get.summary: Retrieve calculated metric functions

500.description: External API error; Calculated metric functions retrieval failed

get.summary: Retrieve a calculated metric function by id

500.description: External API error; Calculated metric function retrieval failed

requestBody.description: JSON-formatted Object containing key/value pairs for calculated metric validation.

400.description: Invalid input; name, rsid, and definition are all required. Definition must be formatted as a JSON Object.

500.description: External API error; Calculated metric validation failed

get.summary: Retrieve a single calculated metric by id
get.description:
A calculated metric response will always include these default items: *id, name, description, rsid, owner, polarity, precision, type* 

Other attributes can be optionally requested through the 'expansion' field:

* *modified*: Date that the metric was last modified (ISO 8601)
* *definition*: Calculated metric definition as JSON object
* *compatibility*: Products that the metric is compatible with
* *reportSuiteName*: Also return the friendly Report Suite name for the RSID
* *tags*: Gives all existing tags associated with the calculated metric

For more information about calculated metrics go [here](https://github.com/AdobeDocs/analytics-2.0-apis/blob/master/calculatedmetrics.md)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The calculated metric ID to retrieve

parameters.name: expansion
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of additional calculated metric metadata fields to include on response.

403.description: Requesting non-shared calculated metrics for other users is restricted to admin users

500.description: External API error; calculated metric retrieval failed

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Calculated Metric ID to be updated

parameters.name: expansion
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of additional calculated metric metadata fields to include on response.

requestBody.description: JSON-formatted Object containing key/value pairs to be updated.

400.description: Definition must be formatted as a JSON Object

401.description: Company mismatch; calculated metric ownership can only be transferred within the same organization

403.description: User does not have permission to update this calculated metric

500.description: External API error; Calculated metric update or retrieval failed

delete.summary: Deletion of Calculated Metrics by Id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The calculated metric ID to be deleted

500.description: External API error; Calculated metric delete failed

get.summary: Retrieves report suites that match the given filters.
get.description: Returns all report suite types in a single collection.

parameters.name: rsids
parameters.description: Filter list to only include suites in this RSID list (comma-delimited)

parameters.name: rsidContains
parameters.description: Filter list to only include suites whose rsid contains rsidContains.

parameters.name: expansion
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of additional metadata fields to include on response.

500.description: Unexpected error; report suite retrieval failed

get.summary: Retrieves report suite by id
get.description: Returns all report suite types in a single collection.

parameters.name: rsid
parameters.description: The rsid of the suite to return

parameters.name: expansion
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of additional metadata fields to include on response.

500.description: Unexpected error; report suite retrieval failed

post.summary: search for tags for several components at once

get.summary: Returns a list of tags for the current user's company

500.description: Unable to retrieve list of tags for user.

post.summary: Saves the given tag(s) for the current user's company
post.description: Allows creation of a new tag and applies that new tag to the passed component

requestBody.description: JSON-formatted array of Tag objects containing key-value pairs

500.description: Unable to save list of tags.

delete.summary: Disassociates all tags from the given components
delete.description: Removes all tags from the passed componentIds. Note that currently this is done in a single DB query, so there is a single combined response for the entire operation.

parameters.name: componentIds
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of componentIds to operate on.

parameters.name: componentType
parameters.description: The component type to operate on.

500.description: Unable to remove tags for given components.

get.summary: Retrieves a tags for a given component by componentId and componentType
get.description: Given a componentId, return all tags associated with that component

parameters.name: componentId
parameters.description: The componentId to operate on. Currently this is just the segmentId.

parameters.name: componentType
parameters.description: The component type to operate on.

500.description: Unable to retrieve tags for given component.

put.summary: Tag a component with one or many tags at once. WARNING: Authoritative; deletes/overwrites all pre-existing associations
put.description: This endpoint allows many tags at once to be created/deleted. Any tags passed to this endpoint will become the *only* tags for that componentId (all other tags will be removed).

requestBody.description: JSON-formatted object containing key-value pairs that conform to the schema

500.description: Unable to save tag list.

get.summary: Retrieves an tag by its id

404.description: Unable to find a tag with the given ID

500.description: Unexpected server error while trying to retrieve tag

delete.summary: Removes the tagId and all associations from that tag to any components
delete.description: Delete by tagId. Will un-tag any/all components that were associated with the passed tagId.

404.description: The given tagId does not exist

500.description: Unable to delete the given tagId.

get.summary: Retrieves component ids associated with the given tag names
get.description: Given a comma separated list of tag names, return component ids associated with them.

parameters.name: tagNames
parameters.description: Comma separated list of tag names.

parameters.name: componentType
parameters.description: The component type to operate on.

500.description: Unable to retrieve tags for given component.

post.summary: search for shares for several components at once

get.summary: get components shared with the current user by type

parameters.name: componentType
parameters.description: Component type to get shared ids for

get.summary: Returns a list of shares for the current user's company

500.description: Unable to retrieve list of shares for user.

put.summary: Share components with users. WARNING: Authoritative; deletes/overwrites all pre-existing shares for the given components

requestBody.description: JSON-formatted array of Share objects containing key-value pairs

500.description: Unexpected server error while trying to update shares

post.summary: Saves the given share for the current user's company
post.description: Allows creation of a new share with a group/user/all

requestBody.description: JSON-formatted array of Share objects containing key-value pairs

500.description: Unable to save list of tags.

get.summary: Retrieves an share by its id

404.description: Unable to find a share with the given ID

500.description: Unexpected server error while trying to retrieve share

delete.summary: Removes the shareId and all associations from that share
delete.description: Delete by shareId. Will un-share the associated component with the entity shared with.

404.description: The given shareId does not exist

500.description: Unable to delete the given shareId.

get.summary: Returns a list of dateranges for the user
get.description: This API allows users to store commonly used date ranges so that they can be reused throughout the product.

parameters.name: filterByIds
parameters.description: Filter list to only include date ranges in the specified list (comma-delimited list of IDs)

parameters.name: expansion
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of additional date range metadata fields to include on response.

parameters.name: includeType
parameters.description: Include additional date ranges not owned by user. The "all" option takes precedence over "shared"

parameters.name: expansion
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of additional date range metadata fields to include on response.

requestBody.description: JSON-formatted array of Date Range objects containing key-value pairs

parameters.name: dateRangeId
parameters.description: The DateRange id for which to retrieve information

parameters.name: expansion

parameters.name: expansion

requestBody.description: JSON-formatted array of Date Range objects containing key-value pairs

parameters.name: dateRangeId
parameters.description: The id of the date range to delete

get.summary: Returns a list of dimensions for a given report suite.

parameters.name: segmentable
parameters.description: Only include dimensions that are valid within a segment.

parameters.name: reportable
parameters.description: Only include dimensions that are valid within a report.

parameters.name: expansion
parameters.description: Add extra metadata to items (comma-delimited list)

401.description: User does not have access to this report suite

500.description: Unexpected internal server error

get.summary: Returns a dimension for the given report suite

parameters.name: dimensionId
parameters.description: The dimension ID. For example a valid id is a value like 'evar1'

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale to use for returning system named dimensions.

parameters.name: expansion
parameters.description: Add extra metadata to items (comma-delimited list)

get.summary: Returns a list of metrics for the given report suite
get.description: This returns the metrics list primarily for the Analytics product. The platform identity API Returns a list of all possible metrics for the supported systems.

parameters.name: rsid
parameters.description: ID of desired report suite ie. myrsid

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Locale that system named metrics should be returned in

parameters.name: segmentable
parameters.description: Filter the metrics by if they are valid in a segment.

parameters.name: expansion
parameters.description: Add extra metadata to items (comma-delimited list)

500.description: Unexpected internal server error

get.summary: Returns a metric for the given report suite

parameters.name: id

parameters.name: rsid
parameters.description: ID of desired report suite ie. myrsid

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Locale that system named metrics should be returned in

parameters.name: expansion
parameters.description: Add extra metadata to items (comma-delimited list)

500.description: Unexpected internal server error

get.summary: Returns a list of projects for the user
get.description: This Returns the projects list primarily for the Analytics product.

parameters.name: includeType
parameters.description: Include additional projects not owned by user. The "all" option takes precedence over "shared". If neither guided, or project is included, both types are returned

parameters.name: expansion
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of additional project metadata fields to include on response.

parameters.name: filterByIds
parameters.description: Filter list to only include projects in the specified list (comma-delimited list of IDs)

parameters.name: ownerId
parameters.description: Filter list to only include projects owned by the specified loginId

parameters.name: expansion
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of additional project metadata fields to include on response.

requestBody.description: JSON-formatted Object containing project keys/value pairs to be updated.

post.summary: Runs a report for the request in the post body

206.description: Partially successful operation.  Some response columns contain errors.  See the [Partial Responses](https://github.com/AdobeDocs/analytics-2.0-apis/blob/master/reporting-guide.md#partial-responses-206-status-code) for details.

400.description: Invalid input; name, rsid, and definition are all required. Definition must be formatted as a JSON Object.

get.summary: Runs a top items report for the request in the post body
get.description: Get the top X items (based on paging restriction) for the specified dimension and rsid. Defaults to last 90 days.

parameters.name: rsid
parameters.description: ID of desired report suite ie. myrsid

parameters.name: dimension
parameters.description: Dimension to run the report against. Example: 'variables/page'

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Locale that system named metrics should be returned in

parameters.name: search-clause
parameters.description: General search string; wrap with single quotes. Example: 'PageABC'

parameters.name: searchAnd
parameters.description: Search terms that will be AND-ed together. Space delimited.

parameters.name: searchOr
parameters.description: Search terms that will be OR-ed together. Space delimited.

parameters.name: searchNot
parameters.description: Search terms that will be treated as NOT including. Space delimited.

parameters.name: searchPhrase
parameters.description: A full search phrase that will be searched for.

parameters.name: searchPhrase
parameters.description: A full search phrase that will be searched for.

parameters.name: lookupNoneValues
parameters.description: Controls None values to be included

206.description: Partially successful operation.  Some response columns contain errors.  See the [Partial Responses](https://github.com/AdobeDocs/analytics-2.0-apis/blob/master/reporting-guide.md#partial-responses-206-status-code) for details.

400.description: Invalid input; name, rsid, and definition are all required. Definition must be formatted as a JSON Object.

get.summary: Retrieve All Segments

parameters.name: filterByPublishedSegments

parameters.name: sortProperty

parameters.name: expansion
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of additional segment metadata fields to include on response.

parameters.name: includeType
parameters.description: Include additional segments not owned by user. The "all" option takes precedence over "shared"

403.description: Requesting non-shared segments for other users is restricted to admin users

500.description: External API error; Segment retrieval failed

parameters.name: expansion
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of additional segment metadata fields to include on response.

requestBody.description: JSON-formatted Object containing key/value pairs for segment creation.

400.description: Invalid input; name, rsid, and definition are all required. Definition must be formatted as a JSON Object.

500.description: External API error; Segment create or retrieval failed

parameters.name: expansion

requestBody.description: JSON-formatted Object containing key/value pairs to be updated.

get.summary: Returns a list of users for the current user's login company
get.description: Retrieves a list of all users for the company designated by the auth token.

500.description: Database error or other unexpected error

get.summary: Get the current user
Retrieves usage and access logs for the search criteria provided.
get.description: This API returns the usage and access logs for a given date range within a 3 month period. This API authenticates with an IMS user token.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date for the maximum of a 3 month period.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date for the maximum of a 3 month period.

parameters.name: login
parameters.description: The login value of the user you want to filter logs by.

parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: The IP address you want to filter logs by.

parameters.name: rsid
parameters.description: The report suite ID you want to filter logs by.

parameters.name: eventType
parameters.description: The numeric id for the event type you want to filter logs by.

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: The event description you want to filter logs by. No wildcards permitted.

403.description: User does not have permission to view this data.

500.description: External API Error; Data could not be retrieved.

rsid.description: The report suite id for which the component was created/updated

reportSuiteName.description: The report suite name for which the component was created/updated

polarity.description: Set metric polarity, which indicates whether it's good or bad if a given metric goes up. Default=positive

precision.description: Number of decimal places to include in calculated metric result

rsid.description: The report suite id for which the component was created/updated

reportSuiteName.description: The report suite name for which the component was created/updated

rsid.description: The report suite id for which the component was created/updated

reportSuiteName.description: The report suite name for which the component was created/updated
The friendly name for the report suite id.

siteTitle.description: A name for the report suite.  This is deprecated and should use the report suite name instead.

tags.description: All existing tags associated with the segment.

reportSuiteName.description: The friendly name for the report suite id.

siteTitle.description: A name for the report suite.  This is deprecated and should use the report suite name instead.

tags.description: All existing tags associated with the segment.

id.description: System generated virtual report suite id

rsid.description: The report suite id for which the component was created/updated

reportSuiteName.description: The report suite name for which the component was created/updated

parentRsid.description: Parent report suite id for virtual report suite

segmentList.description: List of segments applied to this virtual report suite

persistable.description: If a Calculated Metric Function is persistable

id.description: the login id of the owner

name.description: the friendly full login name of the owner, included when the expansion parameter ownerFullName is true

login.description: the friendly full login name of the owner, included when the expansion parameter ownerFullName is true

parentRsid.description: Parent report suite id for virtual report suite

shareToId.description: the id of the user/group the component is shared with

shareToType.description: the type of entity shared with (user/group/all)

shareToDisplayName.description: full name of the entity shared with

componentType.description: the type of component being shared

componentId.description: the id of the component being shared

accessLevel.description: Level of rights shared with entity. (for projects only)

components.description: the list of components that have been tagged with this tag
